page.title: 18The Councillor(1)
page.content:
{ Our councillor }became local { {councillor }in {1958.}He had always been interested and active in community work and when asked to stand saw it as an extension of that activity.
In those early days {Gretna }was a depressed area and looked untidy, neglected and generally uncared for. Many {wooden homes },built during World War 1,were still used for housing the population.There were few amenities and no industry or employment opportunities, other than a laundry.All {north }and {southbound {traffic }came through {Gretna.}An open ditch used to run along the length of{ {Union Road.
